R

readData(FirebaseCallback) - Method in class app.ganchyas.ForumFragment
A helping function to read the data of the database

A helping function to read the data of the database
refreshComments(DataSnapshot) - Method in class app.ganchyas.NonActivityClasses.ForumPack
Refreshes the comments of a forum by using a new snapshot of the forum
refreshContainer - Variable in class app.ganchyas.ForumFragment
Contains reference to the SwipeRefreshLayout to set a refresh Action
regEmail - Variable in class app.ganchyas.AddInfoActivity
Stores the e-mail of the user for re-login before password change(required by FireBase)
regPass - Variable in class app.ganchyas.AddInfoActivity
Store the password of the user for re-login before password change(required by FireBase)
rememberBox - Variable in class app.ganchyas.LoginActivity
A reference to the check box on the UI that if clicked saves the login info to a secure local file
